smells.name: ComplexMethod

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class SettingsFragment is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class StocksProvider is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function updateWidget is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function update is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function loadGraph is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface AppComponent is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface IStocksProvider is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

instances.message: This method is overloaded too many times.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in ("$ticker, ") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: "$ticker, "
Parentheses in (random.nextInt() % 10 == 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: random.nextInt() % 10 == 0
Parentheses in (gainLoss() / totalPositionPrice()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: gainLoss() / totalPositionPrice()
Parentheses in (startTimez[0] == endTimez[0] && startTimez[1] > endTimez[1]) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: startTimez[0] == endTimez[0] && startTimez[1] > endTimez[1]
Parentheses in (5) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 5
Parentheses in (5) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 5
Parentheses in (ItemTouchHelper.DOWN) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ItemTouchHelper.DOWN
Parentheses in (ItemTouchHelper.LEFT) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ItemTouchHelper.LEFT
Parentheses in (ItemTouchHelper.RIGHT) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ItemTouchHelper.RIGHT
Parentheses in (ItemTouchHelper.DOWN) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ItemTouchHelper.DOWN
Parentheses in (ItemTouchHelper.END) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ItemTouchHelper.END

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function import has 5 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function import has 5 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function isNetworkOnline has 5 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function getHistoricalDataShort has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class Range implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.

smells.name: NestedClassesVisibility
smells.description: Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality and therefore this should not be public.

instances.message: Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of SuggestionsAdapter makes it visible externally.
Nested types are often used for implementing private functionality. However the visibility of SuggestionsAdapter makes it visible externally.
